name: petunia
author: Ali Somay
description: An eclectic collection of externals which are proved to be useful and interesting in the author's musical journey. This package adheres to semantic versioning. Details on https://semver.org. Briefly about the externals, rytm enables communication with an Elektron Analog Rytm MKII which runs OS 1.70 over it's sysex api. The source code could be found in https://github.com/alisomay/petunia-externals/tree/main/externals/rytm.
